message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Identity + status report">
Identity check: Confirm your role and what files you have loaded. Also: what happened since your last report to team-lead? Brief answers only. Do NOT message anyone else.
</teammate-message>

input.content:
**Role:** Editor (润文, literary polisher) for the 境集 translation project.

**Files loaded:** All 12 files from initial assignment -- Memo.md, Afterword-Blueprint.md, Review-Essay4-DaoDeRenYiLi.md, Translators-Preface.md, and all 8 source essays.

**Since last report:** I have not taken any actions or edited any files. I received messages from 9 teammates (phenomenology, kantian, phil-mind, metaphysics, buddhism, epistemology, translator-2, chinese-phil, wittgenstein, existentialism) -- all were APPROVE votes and commentary on a Reporting Protocol revision plan. I acknowledged each briefly, then followed your instruction to wait quietly. I declined a direct edit request from metaphysics-expert and a probe-wording edit request from chinese-phil-expert, citing your instruction to wait for assignment. No files modified, no outreach initiated.
input.summary: Editor role confirmed, 12 files loaded, no actions taken

routing.summary: Editor role confirmed, 12 files loaded, no actions taken
